mapper.select: SELECT strategy_measure_task_id,strategy_measure_id,strategy_measure_detail_id,key_task,close_standard,duty_department_id,duty_employee_id,duty_employee_name,duty_employee_code,sort,delete_flag,create_by,create_time,update_by,update_time FROM strategy_measure_task WHERE strategy_measure_task_id=#{strategyMeasureTaskId} and delete_flag=0

SELECT strategy_measure_task_id,strategy_measure_id,strategy_measure_detail_id,key_task,close_standard,duty_department_id,duty_employee_id,duty_employee_name,duty_employee_code,sort,delete_flag,create_by,create_time,update_by,update_time FROM strategy_measure_task WHERE delete_flag=0 AND strategy_measure_detail_id IN
#{item}

SELECT strategy_measure_task_id,strategy_measure_id,strategy_measure_detail_id,key_task,close_standard,duty_department_id,duty_employee_id,duty_employee_name,duty_employee_code,sort,delete_flag,create_by,create_time,update_by,update_time FROM strategy_measure_task WHERE delete_flag=0 AND strategy_measure_detail_id =#{strategyMeasureDetailId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE strategy_measure_task SET
strategy_measure_id=#{strategyMeasureTask.strategyMeasureId},
strategy_measure_detail_id=#{strategyMeasureTask.strategyMeasureDetailId},
key_task=#{strategyMeasureTask.keyTask},
close_standard=#{strategyMeasureTask.closeStandard},
duty_department_id=#{strategyMeasureTask.dutyDepartmentId},
duty_employee_id=#{strategyMeasureTask.dutyEmployeeId},
duty_employee_name=#{strategyMeasureTask.dutyEmployeeName},
duty_employee_code=#{strategyMeasureTask.dutyEmployeeCode},
sort=#{strategyMeasureTask.sort},
delete_flag=#{strategyMeasureTask.deleteFlag},
create_by=#{strategyMeasureTask.createBy},
create_time=#{strategyMeasureTask.createTime},
update_by=#{strategyMeasureTask.updateBy},
update_time=#{strategyMeasureTask.updateTime}
WHERE strategy_measure_task_id=#{strategyMeasureTask.strategyMeasureTaskId}

UPDATE strategy_measure_task SET delete_flag= 1, update_by=#{updateBy}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE strategy_measure_task_id IN
#{item}
